profile.title: Iphrofayili Yomsebenzisi
profile.mustLogin: Kufanele ungene ngemvume ukuze ubuke izilungiselelo.
profile.noPrivateKey: Asikho isikhiye sangasese kulena idivayisi ongasisusa.
profile.importFailed: Kwehlulekile ukungenisa ukhiye (iphasiwedi engalungile noma ifayela lonakele).
profile.keysRotated: Kudalwe umbhangqwana omusha wokhiye kwathi ukhiye womphakathi walayishwa.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Ukhiye wakho wangasese awukhohli kudivayisi. Thekelisa ikhophi evikelwe ngephasiwedi ukuze uyibuyisele kwenye idivayisi.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Usekuhlelo lwe-Free ‚Äî sebenzisa izinketho zeLanga/Nyanga ngezansi. Thuthukisa ukuze uvule izingqikithi ezengeziwe.
profile.backupDesc: Dala izipele ezivikelwe ngephasiwedi zokhiye bakho, bese ubuyisela kwenye idivayisi ukuze uvumelanise.
profile.followHint: Izindaba zabo zizovela kuhlelo lwakho lwe-Okulandelwayo uma bethumela kubalaleli Abalandeli (noma Umphakathi).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Dlulisela izingcingo nemiyalezo engenayo kufoni noma i-imeyili eqinisekisiwe. Okuphuma kungakhombisa inombolo yakho ye-Chatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Khetha okungenani indawo eyodwa (ifoni noma i-imeyili).
profile.errQuietHours: Amahora okuthula kufanele abe phakathi kuka-0 no-23.

support.heading: Singakusiza kanjani?
support.contactIntro: Sizokuphendula nge-imeyili. Faka imininingwane ezosisiza siphindaphinde inkinga.
support.sendError: Akuphumelelanga ukuthumela. Thumela i-imeyili ku-support@chatforia.com esikhundleni salokho.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha umbhalo noma igumbi lengxoxo ukuze uqale ukuxoxa

status.filesNote: Kufika kumafayela ama-5. Kuphelelwa amahora angama-24 ngokuzenzakalela.

contactList.deleteFailed: Kwehlulekile ukususa oxhumana naye. Zama futhi.
contactList.loadFailed: Kwehlulekile ukulayisha oxhumana nabo. Zama futhi.

auth.headline: Ukuxhumana okuphephile, emhlabeni wonke ngokuhumusha ngokushesha
auth.description: Ukufihla kokuphela kuya kokuphela, ukuhumusha kwe-AI, imiyalezo enyamalalayo, nokushaya izwi/ividiyo.

feature.privacy: Ubumfihlo kuqala. Idatha yakho, ukulawula kwakho.

hero.sub: Ukufihla kokuphela kuya kokuphela, ukuhumusha kwe-AI, imiyalezo enyamalalayo, nokushaya izwi/ividiyo.

feat.privacy: Ubumfihlo kuqala. Idatha yakho, ukulawula kwakho.

auth.desktopTip: Ku-desktop? Skena ngefoni yakho ukuthola uhlelo.
auth.scanHelper: Ku-desktop? Skena ngefoni yakho ukuthola uhlelo.
auth.subhead: Ukuxhumana okuyimfihlo, okufihliwe, futhi okuhunyushiwe ‚Äî ngokushesha.
auth.tip: Ithiphu: Sebenzisa i-akhawunti efanayo kuwebhu nakumakhalekhukhwini. Imiyalezo yakho iyahlala ivumelanisiwe.
auth.scanHint: Skena ukuze ulande uhlelo noma ukuvula kubhrawuza.

press.title: Ababezindaba
press.boilerplateBody: I-Chatforia uyinhlangano yokuxhumana ebeka ubumfihlo phambili futhi yenza izingxoxo zolimi olwehlukene zibe lula. Imiyalezo ifihlwa kokuphela kuya kokuphela ngokuzenzakalela, futhi ukuhumusha kwakhelwe ngaphakathi kusekela izilimi ezingu-100+ ngesikhathi sangempela. Abasebenzisi bangavula imiyalezo enyamalalayo, benze izinkomba zokufundwa ngokuzithandela, futhi bavumelanise amadivayisi. Iyatholakala ku-iOS, Android, nakuwebhu.
press.scanTip: Ku-desktop? Skena ngefoni yakho ukuthola uhlelo.

careers.title: Imisebenzi
careers.intro: Siyithimba elincane elakha umyalezo oyingxubevange, wendawo yonke. Uma unendaba nokufihla, ukufinyeleleka, kanye ne-UX emnandi, singathanda ukuzwa kuwe.
careers.openRoles: Izikhundla ezivuliwe: Ubunjiniyela (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Umkhiqizo, Ukusekela.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Chatforia
about.description: I-Chatforia uyumyalezo ophephile, onolimi oluningi onokufihla kokuphela kuya kokuphela, ukuhumusha okusheshayo, nokushaya izwi/ividiyo. Umgomo wethu ulula: ukusiza abantu baxhumane ‚Äî ngokuphepha, ngokuyimfihlo, futhi beqwesha izilimi.

values.access: <bold>Ukufinyelela kubo bonke:</bold> Humusha izilimi ezingu-100+ ngokuzenzakalela.
values.access_aria: Ukufinyelela kubo bonke: Humusha izilimi ezingu-100+.
values.control_aria: Ukulawula: Imiyalezo enyamalalayo nezinkomba zokufundwa ngokuzithandela.

about.howDescription: Imiyalezo ifihlwa kudivayisi yakho ngaphambi kokuba ihambe. Ukuhumusha, izipele, nokuvumelanisa kudizayinwe ukunciphisa lokho okubonwa amaseva ethu.

advertise.title: Khangisa nge-Chatforia
advertise.description: Finyelela abasebenzisi abangene yingxoxo ngezikhala ezinhle nezihloniphekile. Sinikeza ama-banner ezindaweni ezibonakalayo, izibonelelo, nezikhangiso zethu zangaphakathi. Ababhalisele i-Premium abababoni izikhangiso.

adsense.withPubId: Okwamanje sisebenzisa Google AdSense. Uma ungathanda ukusimaka nge-Google Ads, sebenzisa i-publisher ID {{pubId}} bese ucela i-managed placement kumayunithi angezansi. Izibonelelo eziqondile ziyatholakala ‚Äî sebenzisa ifomu.
adsense.noPubId: Okwamanje sisebenzisa Google AdSense. Izivumelwano eziqondile nazo ziyatholakala ‚Äî sebenzisa ifomu elingezansi.

advertise.noPlacements: Azikabikho izikhala ezilungiselelwe okwamanje. Wengeza ku-ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Imvamisa ephezulu yokuvakashela nesikhathi eside sokuhlala ku-UI yengxoxo
why.brandSafe: Izakhiwo eziphephile kumkhiqizo; ukunciphisa ukuphindaphinda okuhloniphekile
why.deals: Izivumelwano eziqondile noma nge-programmatic nge-AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Ngiyabonga! Umbuzo wakho usendleleni. Sizolandela maduze.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvulwa uhlelo lwe-imeyili ukuze uthumele umbuzo‚Ä¶

upgrade.title: Thuthukisa
upgrade.subtitle: Vula uhlelo olufanele: susa izikhangiso nge-Plus, noma uthole wonke amandla nge-Premium.

premiumMonthly.title: Premium (Ngenyanga)
premiumMonthly.desc: Izici eziphelele, ama-ringtone, namathuluzi e-AI anamandla.

premiumAnnual.title: Premium (Ngonyaka)
premiumAnnual.disclaimer: Kukhokhelwa kusengaphambili. Ungakhansela noma nini. Azikho izindleko ezifihliwe.

marketing.premiumMonthlyDesc: Izici eziphelele, ama-ringtone, namathuluzi e-AI anamandla.
marketing.annualDisclaimer: Kukhokhelwa kusengaphambili. Ungakhansela noma nini. Azikho izindleko ezifihliwe.

gettingStarted.title: Ukuqala
gettingStarted.subtitle: Umusha ku-Chatforia? Lesi siqalo esisheshayo sikukhombisa ezisemqoka ukuze uqale emizuzwini embalwa.

alert.text: Lo mhlahlandlela uzokhula njengoba sikwethulela izici ezisha. Uma kukhona okushodayo, sazise nge-

section2.title: 2) Qala ukuxoxa
section2.item1: Dala i-DM noma Iqembu bese uthumela umyalezo wakho wokuqala.
section2.item2: Sebenzisa ukuhumusha okusheshayo ukuze ukhulume ngezilimi ezingu-100+.
section2.item3: Zama imiyalezo enyamalalayo nezinkomba zokufundwa ku-Iphrofayili ‚Üí Ubumfihlo.

section3.title: 3) Hamba phambili
section3.item2Part1: Xhuma amadivayisi angeziwe futhi usethe izispelele ezifihliwe ku-

account.q: Ngidala noma ngibuyisa kanjani i-akhawunti yami?
account.a: Landa uhlelo noma sebenzisa iwebhu, chofoza ‚ÄúDala i-akhawunti‚Äù, uqinisekise i-imeyili/ifoni. Ukubuyisa, sebenzisa ‚ÄúUkhohliwe iphasiwedi‚Äù.

privacy.a: Yebo. Imiyalezo nezingcingo zifihlwa kokuphela kuya kokuphela ngokuzenzakalela. Wena nomamukeli kuphela eningayifunda.

translate.a: Nika amandla ‚ÄúHumusha ngokuzenzakalela‚Äù ku-Izilungiselelo ‚Üí Ukubukeka & Ulimi. Sihumusha kudivayisi lapho kusekelwa, kungenjalo nge-API eziphephile ngemetadata emincane.

contact.a: Sifinyelele ku-support@chatforia.com. Faka izithombe-skrini nenguqulo yohlelo.

contact.title: Xhumana Nathi
contact.errorSend: Akuphumelelanga ukuthumela. Sicela uthumele i-imeyili ku-support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Le Nqubomgomo Yobumfihlo ichaza ukuthi i-Chatforia (‚Äúthina‚Äù, ‚Äúthina‚Äù) iqoqa kanjani, isebenzisa kanjani, futhi yabelana kanjani ngolwazi lapho usebenzisa izinhlelo zethu nezinsiza. Siklama i-Chatforia ukuze sinciphise idatha esingayibona.

infoWeCollect.title: Ulwazi esiluqoqayo
infoWeCollect.account: Ulwazi lwe-akhawunti (isb., i-imeyili/ifoni) lokudala nokuvikela i-akhawunti yakho.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Okuqukethwe okufihliwe (imiyalezo/izingcingo) kufihlwe kokuphela kuya kokuphela; asikwazi ukukufunda.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Imininingwane yokudayagnostika/nokusetshenziswa efana namalogi okuwa, uhlobo lwedivayisi, noma uhlaziyo oluncane ukuze sithuthukise ukusebenza.

sharing.title: Ukwabelana
sharing.body: Asithengisi idatha yomuntu siqu. Singabelana ngedatha elinganiselwe nabaqambi (isb., izaziso zokucindezela, uhlaziyo) ngaphansi kwezinkontileka eziqinile.

rights.title: Amalungelo akho
rights.body: Ngokwesifunda sakho (isb., i-GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ungacela ukufinyelela, ukulungisa, ukususa, noma ukuphuma kwezinye izinqubo. Xhumana: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ukugcinwa kwedatha & ukuphepha
retention.body: Sigcina kuphela okudingekayo ukuze sisebenze insiza bese sisebenzisa ukuphepha okujwayelekile kwezimboni. Okuqukethwe kwe-E2E asikwazi ukukuhumushela.

children.title: Izingane
children.body: I-Chatforia ayiqondiselwe ezinganeni ezingaphansi kuka-13 (noma njengoba kudingwa umthetho wendawo yakho).

changes.title: Izinguquko
changes.body: Sizobeka izibuyekezo lapha futhi silungise ‚ÄúUsuku lokubuyekeza kokugcina‚Äù.

intro.body: Ngokusebenzisa i-Chatforia uyavuma le Migomo. Uma ungavumi, sicela ungasebenzisi insiza.

accounts.title: Ama-akhawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nikeza ulwazi olunembile futhi ugcine izikhiye ziphephile.

acceptableUse.title: Ukusetshenziswa okuvumelekile
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Akukho okuqukethwe okungekho emthethweni, okuhlukumezayo, noma okwephula amalungelo; akukho ugaxekile noma ukusetshenziswa okuzenzakalelayo okubi.

yourContent.title: Okuqukethwe kwakho
yourContent.body: Uyasigcina amalungelo akuqukethwe kwakho. Uyanika thina amalungelo adingekayo ukuze sisebenze insiza (isb., ukuhambisa, ukugcina, ukuhumusha).

disclaimer.title: Izimangalo & umthwalo
disclaimer.body: Insiza inikezwa ‚Äúnjengoba injalo‚Äù ngaphandle kweziqinisekiso. Ngokwedigri enkulu evunyelwe ngumthetho, i-Chatforia ayibophezele kumonakalo ongaphezulu noma ongenxa.

changes.title: Izinguquko
changes.body: Singabuyekeza le migomo; uqhubeka nokusebenzisa ngemva kwezinguquko kusho ukwamukela.

doNotSell.title: Ungathengisi noma Wabelane Ngolwazi Lwami Lomuntu Siqu
doNotSell.body: I-Chatforia ayithengisi ulwazi lomuntu siqu. Izakhamuzi zase-California zisengakwazi ukuthumela izicelo ngaphansi kwe-CPRA ngokuchofoza inkinobho engezansi.

cookies.title: Izilungiselelo Zamakhukhi
cookies.body: I-Chatforia isebenzisa amakhukhi ambalwa (isb., iseshini, ukuphepha). Asisebenzisi amakhukhi ezikhangiso zangaphandle. Phatha amakhukhi kuzilungiselelo zesiphequluli sakho.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ayikho inombolo enikeziwe. Khetha ngokwe-area code ukuze uqale ukuthumela imiyalezo.

startChatModal.title: Qala ingxoxo
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Thayipha igama, igama lomsebenzisi, ifoni, noma i-imeyili‚Ä¶
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Thayipha igama lomsebenzisi noma ifoni bese uchofoza Sesha.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Okufakiwe kwefoni/i-imeyili kuzotholakala ngemva kokuthi uselondolozile njengoxhumana naye.

sounds.freeNotice: Useku-Free ‚Äî amathoni e-premium aboniswa kodwa avalekile. Thuthukisa ukuze uvule konke.

aiSettings.title: Izilungiselelo ze-AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Lawula ukuhumusha, izimpendulo ezihlakaniphile, kanye nezimpendulo ezizenzakalelayo ze-ForiaBot.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Thumela imiyalezo embalwa yakamuva eyamukelwe (esulwe imininingwane ebucayi) ku-AI ukuze inikeze iziphakamiso ezisheshayo.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Uma ivuliwe, iziphakamiso ezibuya ku-AI zizofihlwa amagama agciniwe
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Nika amandla impendulo ezenzakalelayo uma ngimatasa

accessibilitySettings.title: Ukufinyeleleka & Izexwayiso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Izinketho zokwenza i-Chatforia ibe lula ngaphandle kokuthembela emsindweni.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Iqala ngosayizi ojwayelekile. Wenyuse uma uthanda umbhalo omkhulu kuzilungiselelo zokufinyeleleka.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Izexwayiso ezibonakalayo zemiyalezo & izingcingo
Bonisa amabhanela nokucwayiza kwesihloko ukuze ungaphuthelwa umsebenzi.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Dlidliza emiyalezweni emisha (lapho kusekelwa)
Vusa ukudlidliza kwedivayisi ngezaziso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Khanyisa isikrini lapho kukhona ucingo olungenayo
Ukukhanya okufushane okukhanyayo lapho kukhala ucingo.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Humusha ngokuzenzakalela amanothi ezwi
Namathelisa umbhalo kumilayezo yomsindo oyamukelayo.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Bonisa amabhanela nokucwayiza kwesihloko ukuze ungaphuthelwa umsebenzi.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Khanyisa isikrini lapho kukhona ucingo olungenayo
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Ukukhanya okufushane okukhanyayo lapho kukhala ucingo.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Gcina kuphela umbhalo ofihliwe kuseva. Kukhubaza i-AI/Humusha kanye nokubuka kwangaphambi kokuhlunga.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Sesha nge-alias, igama, igama lomsebenzisi, noma ifoni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Yabelana ngesixhumanisi sakho sememo ukuze niqale ukuxoxa ngokushesha.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Hlala uxhumene uhamba ne-Chatforia ye-iOS ne-Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Ithiphu: Imiyalezo yakho ihlala ivumelanisiwe phakathi kwewebhu nomakhalekhukhwini.

randomChat.title: Ingxoxo Engahleliwe
randomChat.description: Hlangana nomuntu omusha manje. Sizokuxhumanisa kuvulwe ikamelo lenkathi ethile.

login.title: Siyakwamukela futhi
login.subtitle: Ngena ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Chatforia
login.ssoUnavailable: I-single-sign-on okwamanje ayitholakali. Sebenzisa igama lomsebenzisi & iphasiwedi.

error.unprocessable: Isicelo asiqondakali. Hlola igama lomsebenzisi/i-imeyili nephasiwedi.
error.deviceLimit: Umkhawulo wamadivayisi ufinyele uhlelo lwe-Free. Phuma kwenye idivayisi noma thuthukisa ku-Premium ukuze uxhumanise eminingi.
